name: One Stop, One Shop
description:
It's a hot summer day and people may want three things: Refreshments, Hotdogs, or Ice Cream. The good news? You have them all! The bad news, you can only build one shop at a time. To build a different type, destroy the current shop.

This game is an entry to the Mini Jam: 108 game jam.

-- CREDITS TO ASSETS USED: --

Mushroom Dance by Bart

Ocean Waves by Noted451

feedback and criticism are highly appreciated. have a day! :D
